results.more_info: Southeast Grind is a locally owned and operated café in the heart of SE Portland. We offer local and healthy drinks and snacks in a bright little shop. We believe in promoting what makes Portland such a stellar name by featuring local artists, choosing local vendors and honoring all things eclectic and fun.
results.name: Southeast Grind

results.info: Dive bar. Food and pinball. What more could you ask for?
